132.movie_plot: The original '70s T.V. family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

153.movie_plot: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

162.movie_plot: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

129.movie_plot: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

133.movie_plot: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

159.movie_plot: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

158.movie_plot: A stubborn man past his prime reflects his life of strict independence and seeks more out of himself.

152.movie_plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

163.movie_plot: When a boy comes to a new school and gets harassed by a bully, he acquires the services of the school's most feared kid as a bodyguard.

142.movie_plot: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss' job.
